# itemIdentifiers

**Instance Property**

The identifiers of all of the items in the snapshot.

## Declaration

```swift
var itemIdentifiers: [Any] { get }
```

## Identifying items and sections

- **sectionIdentifiers**: The identifiers of all of the sections in the snapshot.
- **index(ofItemIdentifier:)**: Returns the index of the item in the snapshot with the specified identifier.
- **index(ofSectionIdentifier:)**: Returns the index of the section of the snapshot with the specified identifier.
- **itemIdentifiersInSection(withIdentifier:)**: Returns the identifiers of all of the items in the specified section of the snapshot.
- **sectionIdentifier(forSectionContainingItemIdentifier:)**: Returns the identifier of the section containing the specified item in the snapshot.

items.description: The identifiers of all of the sections in the snapshot.
items.name: sectionIdentifiers

items.description: Returns the index of the item in the snapshot with the specified identifier.
items.name: index(ofItemIdentifier:)

items.description: Returns the index of the section of the snapshot with the specified identifier.

items.description: Returns the identifiers of all of the items in the specified section of the snapshot.
items.name: itemIdentifiersInSection(withIdentifier:)

items.description: Returns the identifier of the section containing the specified item in the snapshot.
items.name: sectionIdentifier(forSectionContainingItemIdentifier:)
